description: Mari stands at least eight feet tall with tanned skin and an enormous musculature. She is an obvious parody of http://anidb.net/ch7535 [Kenshiro] from the anime/manga series http://anidb.net/a386 [Fist of the North Star]. She looks quite a bit like him, uses a similar fighting style, constantly tatters her clothing when flexing and has many of his mannerisms; however, her speaking voice is a normal female one.
name: Mari
